fields.summary: Journey map > Filter should not be set with empty value
fields.description: Check if OS type filter takes selected value, not empty

steps.result:
Filter should be displayed correctly.
Filter should not show empty value.
Filter should not show "object Object".
steps.action: Check if filter is rendered correctly.

fields.summary: Journey map > Add custom dimention to journey map filter.
fields.description: Check if list of custom dimensions is passed to journey map filters

steps.result: List of custom dimensions is rendered.
steps.action: Select "custom dimension" option in the list on the left.
Select specific custom dimension and select dimension rule.

fields.summary: Journey map > Add custom dimension as leading dimension for JM
fields.description: Check if custom dimensions are available to be selected as leading dimension for JM

steps.action: Filter time period to get data.

steps.result: Custom dimension selected. Data is changed according to selected dimension.
steps.action: Select custom dimension from related list.

fields.summary: Journey map > Area availability
fields.description: Check if Journeymap area is available.

fields.summary: Journey map > Change time period.
fields.description: Check ability to change journey map time period.

steps.result: Time period changed, data changed according to time period.
steps.action: Set pre-defined time period, check data is rendered.

steps.result: Time period changed, data changed according to time period.
steps.action: Set custom time period, check data is rendered.

fields.summary: Journey map > Select application for Journey map analyses.
fields.description: Check ability to select application for Journey map

steps.result: Application set. Data is rendered for selected application.

fields.summary: Journey map > Pin application in app picker.
fields.description: Check ability to pin application in app picker.

steps.result: Application set. Data is rendered for selected application.

App is pinned, pin icon changed to vertical position.
App is added to "pinned" list inside picker.
steps.action: Inside app picker select application and click on pin button.

fields.summary: Journey map > Set leading dimension for journey map analyses.
fields.description: Check leading dimension can be selected for journey map.

steps.action: Click on "+" button to select leading dimension.

steps.result:
Dimension is set.
Data is changed according to selection.

steps.action: Unset leading dimension clicking on "x" button.

fields.summary: Journey map > Set filtering by rule of leading dimension.
fields.description: Check specific rule can be set as filter for JM.

steps.action: Click on "+" button to select leading dimension.

steps.result:
Dimension is set.
Data is changed according to selection.

steps.action: Unset leading dimension clicking on "x" button.

steps.result:
Filter is set.
Chart is changed accordingly.
steps.action: Click on filter button on specific rule of dimension.

fields.summary: Journey map > Journey should be provided according to selected node.
fields.description: Check journey chart is highlighted when specific node is selected.

steps.action: Click any node of any step.

fields.summary: Journey map > Node detail pop-up should be available for each node.
fields.description: Check if node detail is available for each node.

steps.result:
• Node detail pop up opened.
  • Textual data is shown right away, not waiting for the screenshot.
steps.action: Select the node by hovering cursor over it and click on detail button.

steps.result:
Data is rendered correctly.
Tabs are functional and provide correct data.
steps.data:
Data:
  • App view
  • Node name
  • Number of sessions
  • Time in view
  • Struggle score
Tabs:
  • Abandons
  • Performance
  • Struggles
Buttons:
  • Session drilldown
  • Mobile report
steps.action: Check data rendered on detail pop up.

fields.summary: Journey map > Drill down to sessions from node detail pop up.
fields.description: Check user can drill to recorded sessions using "sessions drilldown" button on session detail pop up.

steps.result:
• Node detail pop up opened.
  • Textual data is shown right away, not waiting for the screenshot.
steps.action: Select the node by hovering cursor over it and click on detail button.

steps.result:
Data is rendered correctly.
Tabs are functional and provide correct data.
steps.data:
Data:
  • App view
  • Node name
  • Number of sessions
  • Time in view
  • Struggle score
Tabs:
  • Abandons
  • Performance
  • Struggles
Buttons:
  • Session drilldown
  • Mobile report
steps.action: Check data rendered on detail pop up.

steps.result:
Moved to recorded sessions.
Sessions filtered according to node used for drill-down.
steps.action: Click "sessions drilldown" button on details pop up.

fields.summary: Journey map > Open mobilebox view using journey map "mobile report" button in node detail pop up.
fields.description: Check it is possible to open mobile box using node detail pop up.

steps.result:
• Node detail pop up opened.
  • Textual data is shown right away, not waiting for the screenshot.
steps.action: Select the node by hovering cursor over it and click on detail button.

steps.result:
Data is rendered correctly.
Tabs are functional and provide correct data.
steps.data:
Data:
  • App view
  • Node name
  • Number of sessions
  • Time in view
  • Struggle score
Tabs:
  • Abandons
  • Performance
  • Struggles
Buttons:
  • Session drilldown
  • Mobile report
steps.action: Check data rendered on detail pop up.

steps.result:
Moved to mobile box overview.
Filter is applied according to node used for drill down.
steps.action: Click "mobile report" button inside node detail pop up.

fields.summary: Journey map > App-View zoom should be available in node detail pop up.
fields.description: Check application view should be zoomed on the click action.

steps.result:
• Node detail pop up opened.
  • Textual data is shown right away, not waiting for the screenshot.
steps.action: Select the node by hovering cursor over it and click on detail button.

steps.result:
Data is rendered correctly.
Tabs are functional and provide correct data.
steps.data:
Data:
  • App view
  • Node name
  • Number of sessions
  • Time in view
  • Struggle score
Tabs:
  • Abandons
  • Performance
  • Struggles
Buttons:
  • Session drilldown
  • Mobile report
steps.action: Check data rendered on detail pop up.

steps.result:
App view is zoomed in.
On second click app view is zoomed out.
steps.action: In node detail pop up click view visualization.

fields.summary: Journey map > Create funnel using "select mode" of JM.
fields.description: Check it is possible to create funnel from JM.

steps.action: Activate select mode by clicking "select mode" button.

steps.result:
"+" button appears on hovering the node by cursor.
Selected node is constantly highlighted blue.
"-" button appears on selected node allowing to deselect the node.

"Create Funnel" dialog opened.
Name is required field.
Add current filters to funnel definition selector rendered and activated.
All selected nodes are rendered as a funnel steps.
Step names are edit-able.
Cancel/Create funnel buttons rendered.
Pop up can be closed with "x" button click.
steps.action: Click "create funnel button after needed nodes are selected.

steps.result:
Funnel is created.
Appropriate message appears in the bottom of the screen.

fields.summary: Checking an ability to search also for custom dimensions.

steps.action: In the bottom section click on 'Gear' icon and verify that 'Selection Dimension' pop-up is opened.

steps.result: It is possible to search by custom dimension in the 'Select Dimension' pop-up.
steps.action: On the opened pop-up find 'Search' field and try to search by any available  custom dimension.

fields.summary: Journey Map>Checking that it is impossible to apply a double filter.

steps.result: Dimension 'Country' is present, drop-down list is opened.
steps.action: On the opened page click on the 'Filter' button and choose a dimension -'Country'.
Choose any country from available (Israel, for example) and click on the'✔' button and apply filter.

steps.result: Applied country filter stays as it was no double filter is present.
steps.action: At the bottom section find 'Country' widget and click on the bar with the country title.

fields.summary: Journey Map>Checking that 'Had a crash'  name is displayed correctly.

steps.action: Select 'Had a crash' from the dimensions picker.

steps.result: 'Had crash' is added as a filter.
steps.action: Clicking on the 'Had crash' chart in order to add it as a filter.

steps.result: 'Had crash' name is displayed correctly in the filter.
steps.action: Look at the filter name and verify that 'Had crash' name is displayed correctly in the filter.

fields.summary: Journey Map>Checking that  no errors are displayed for Journey County Chart  and all svg files for countries are present.

steps.result: Country is selected in the dimension picker.
steps.action: Select Country from the dimension picker.

steps.result: No errors are displayed in the console.
steps.action: Open Dev tool (Console) and verify that no errors are displayed there.

fields.summary: Journey Map - Clickmap for Mobile and Web.
fields.description: Testing, that Clickmap for Mobile works correctly.

steps.action: Hover cursor on any tile in Journey Map.

fields.summary: Journey Map>Picker graphs-menu are displayed in dimensions.
fields.description: Testing that picker graphs-menu are displayed in dimensions.

steps.result:
List of dimensions appeared.
Bar chart is displayed in front of every dimension.

steps.action: Click on Bar Chart in any dimension.

steps.result: Dimension in chosen Display type appeared.
steps.action:
Set Display type for dimension.
Click Set Dimension button.

fields.summary: Journey map - Display type is displayed correctly.
fields.description: Testing that display type is displayed correctly.

steps.action: Choose Pie-graph for several dimensions and set them.

steps.result: Dimensions are displayed in graph display type (default).
steps.action: Set previous dimensions one more time (don't choose type of display for them).

fields.summary: Journeymap > Add dimension chart.
fields.description: Check new chart can be added to chart section in Journey map

steps.result:
Dimension selector opened.
Categorized list of available dimensions is rendered.
Search field is rendered.
"Set dimension" button is rendered.
steps.action: Click on gear button in down-right corner of the screen.

steps.result:
Selected dimension must be highlighted blue.
Number of selected dimensions should be rendered correctly in upper-right corner of the selector.
Tool-tip should be rendered on hovering dimension in the list.
steps.action: Click on dimension in the list.

steps.result:
Selector closed.
Chart added to list of charts.
Data is rendered according to selected chart.
steps.action: Click "Set Dimensions" button in the selector.

fields.summary: Journeymap > Deselect chart.

steps.result:
Dimension selector opened.
Categorized list of available dimensions is rendered.
Search field is rendered.
"Set dimension" button is rendered.
steps.action: Click on gear button in down-right corner of the screen.

steps.result:
Deselected dimension must be not highlighted blue.
Number of selected dimensions should be rendered correctly in upper-right corner of the selector.
Tool-tip should be rendered on hovering dimension in the list.
steps.action: Click on selected dimension in the list.

steps.result: Deselected dimension chart should not be rendered in chart section.

fields.summary: Journeymap > Reorder chart list.
fields.description: Check if chart order can be changed.

steps.result: Chart reacts on drag-n-drop event and changes it's position in the list.
steps.data: Clicking on chart name.
steps.action: Inside the chart section drag and drop chart.

fields.summary: Journeymap > Select chart type rendered in chart section.
fields.description: Check if chart type can selected.

steps.result:
Dimension selector opened.
Categorized list of available dimensions is rendered.
Search field is rendered.
"Set dimension" button is rendered.
steps.action: Click on gear button in down-right corner of the screen.

steps.result:
Select one of chart types.
Selected type should be rendered in the list.
steps.action: On the right side of chart name click on chart type button.

steps.result: Selected chart is rendered in the correct way.
steps.action:
Click "Set Dimensions" button.
Check if selected dimension is rendered in correct way inside chart section.

fields.summary: Journeymap > Add several dimension charts.
fields.description: Check several charts can be added to chart section in Journey map.

steps.result:
Dimension selector opened.
Categorized list of available dimensions is rendered.
Search field is rendered.
"Set dimension" button is rendered.
steps.action: Click on gear button in down-right corner of the screen.

steps.result:
Selected dimension must be highlighted blue.
Number of selected dimensions should be rendered correctly in upper-right corner of the selector.
Tool-tip should be rendered on hovering dimension in the list.
steps.action: Click on dimension in the list.

steps.result:
Selected charts are rendered in chart section.
Maximum 12 charts can be selected on the same time.
steps.action: Select several charts to be displayed same way as in step 3.

steps.result:
Selector closed.
Chart added to list of charts.
Data is rendered according to selected chart.
steps.action: Click "Set Dimensions" button in the selector.

fields.summary: Journeymap > Check dimension search in dimension selector.
fields.description: Check you can search for needed dimension in the selector.

steps.result:
Dimension selector opened.
Categorized list of available dimensions is rendered.
Search field is rendered.
"Set dimension" button is rendered.
steps.action: Click on gear button in down-right corner of the screen.
Click on search input inside selector.

steps.result: Struggle rank dimension should be rendered in the list.
steps.data: e.g. Struggle rank

fields.summary: Journeymap > Apply filter to Journey map
fields.description: Check you can apply filter.

steps.action: In a filter selector pop-up select category in the left list.

steps.result: User is moved to next selector to specify filter value.
steps.action: Select filter in the right list.

steps.result: Filter is applied, data is filtered according to filter setup.
steps.action: Specify filter value and apply filter.

fields.summary: Journeymap > Apply several filters to Journey map.
fields.description: Check you can apply filters.

steps.action: In a filter selector pop-up select category in the left list.

steps.result: User is moved to next selector to specify filter value.
steps.action: Select filter in the right list.
Specify filter value and click "add filter button.

steps.result: Several filters applied, data is filtered according to setup.

fields.summary: Journeymap > Clear all filter list.
fields.description: Check you can clear all selected filters.

steps.action: In a filter selector pop-up select category in the left list.

steps.result: User is moved to next selector to specify filter value.
steps.action: Select filter in the right list.
Specify filter value and click "add filter button.

steps.result:
All filters cleared.
Moved to previous selector.

fields.summary: Journeymap > Select commonly used filter.
fields.description: Check you can apply filters used recently.

steps.result: Moved to selector where recently used filters are rendered.
User is moved to next selector to specify filter value.

Filter applied.
Data is filtered according to setup.

fields.summary: Journeymap > Clear all selected filters
fields.description: Check you can clear all applied filters.

steps.result: Moved to selector where recently used filters are rendered.
User is moved to next selector to specify filter value.

Filter applied.
Data is filtered according to setup.

fields.summary: Journeymap > Pin filter.
fields.description: Check you can pin filter.

steps.action: In a filter selector pop-up select category in the left list.

steps.result: User is moved to next selector to specify filter value.
steps.action: Select filter in the right list.

steps.result: Filter is applied, data is filtered according to filter setup.
steps.action: Specify filter value, click 'pin' icon and apply filter.

steps.result: Pinned filter is rendered in the pinned list.
steps.action: Open filter selector and check pinned filters list in "commonly used" tab.

fields.summary: Journey Map>Checking that after drilling to sessions cursor is not changed and is displayed correctly.

steps.action: Choose any element in the available steps and click on it.
After creating a funnel click on 'View a funnel' link.

steps.result: Cursor isn't changed and is displayed correctly.
steps.action: Hover cursor over any available element on the page as soon as drilling began.

fields.summary: Journey Map>Checking that it is impossible to create a funnel with less than 3 characters long name.

steps.action: Choose any element in the available steps and click on it.

steps.result: It is not possible to create a funnel with less than 3 characters long name.
steps.action: Input space and 2 valid characters as a funnel name and try to save such funnel.

fields.summary: Journey Map>Checking that it is impossible to create a funnel with an empty name.

steps.action: Choose any element in the available steps and click on it.

steps.result:
It is impossible to create a funnel without a name, validation message is displayed.










Attachments
steps.action: Input spaces as a funnel name and try to save such funnel. Click on the "Create Funnel" button.

fields.summary: Journey Map> Checking that while adding  to Favorities pop-up doesn't contain HTML elements in the name.

steps.action: Choose any element in the available steps and click on its "..." button.
In the opened form click on the Session Drilldown button (►).

steps.result: The yellow ribbon is already applied and click on the "Add to Favorites" button (☆).
steps.action: On the opened page verify that the yellow ribbon is already applied and click on the "Add to Favorites" button (☆).

steps.result: Adding to the favorites form doesn't contain any HTML elements in the name.

fields.summary: Journey Map>Checking that a new custom dimension appears in the list in 'Journey Map'.

steps.action: On the opened page click on the '+' button and create custom dimension 'NEW_MY_OWN_DIMENSION'.

steps.result: New custom dimension appears in the list in 'Journey Map'
steps.action: Click on the 'Geer' button and try to select just created dimension from the list.

fields.summary: Journey Map>Checking that applied custom dimension  is displayed if it has the same name as a default dimension.

steps.action: On the opened page click on the '+' button and create custom dimension 'City' or 'Country'.
Click on the 'Geer' button, select just created custom dimension and click on the 'Set Dimension' button.
